resources.string: Picture of me on giant Einstein statue
Picture of me and Tae at BLM plaza in DC
Hi, my name is Casey Hird. I\'m a senior math major from Spartanburg, SC.
My favorite programming language is C++ because it is what I learned to use for algorithms in 2120, so I\'m a big fan of the STL. My favorite food is a PB&J sandwich.
My hobbies include playing basketball, tennis, and guitar. A fun fact about me is that I was right in front of the camera at the 2018 CFP Natty.
